articles.author: AP
articles.title: Afghan survivors of US drone strike: Sorry 'is not enough' - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: KABUL: Sorry is not enough for the Afghan survivors of an errant US drone strike that killed 10 members of their family, including seven children.
articles.content: Afghan survivors of US drone strike: Sorry 'is not enough'

articles.title: New K-dramas to catch from now until November starring Jun Ji-hyun, Kim Go-eun, Song Hye-kyo, Kim Soo-hyun - AsiaOne

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Nazir Razak 'moonlights' as e-hailing driver for a day - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: A few airasia Ride customers on Merdeka Day (Aug 31) were surprised by their driver that day, who turned out to be none other than prominent banker Datuk Seri Nazir Razak.
articles.content:

articles.title: Infectious diseases expert on living with Covid-19: 'Singapore can open up faster if it is willing to accept 6 or 7 deaths a day' - AsiaOne
